#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
typedef struct {
    long long int val;
    int in;
}ad;
bool cc(ad a,ad b)
{
    return(a.val>b.val);
}
int main()
{
    int t,n,i;
    scanf("%d",&t);

    while(t--)
    {
         scanf("%d",&n);
         long long int b[n],d[n];
         ad c[n];
         for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                scanf("%lld",&c[i].val);
                c[i].in=i;
            }
         for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                scanf("%lld",&b[i]);
                d[i]=b[i];
            }
         sort(c,c+n,cc);
         sort(d,d+n);
         for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                if(d[i]!=b[c[i].in])
                    break;
            }
         if(i==n)
            printf("YES\n");
         else
            printf("NO\n");


    }
}
